definition: to feel strongly about/to be fond of/obsession/deep commitment
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: On Meeting the Celebrated I have always wondered at the passion many people have to meet the celebrated.
sentences.chinese: 論見名人許多人熱衷於見名人，我始終不得其解。

sentences.english: Second, he pays little attentation to his cloth, food or other enjoyments but spend much money to buy law books.
sentences.chinese: 還有，他不注重衣食住行，而熱衷於購買法律書籍。

sentences.english: 'I'm not enthused about buying clothes. They don't interest me, ' he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說，我並不熱衷買衣服，我對此不感興趣。

sentences.english: This is thenichethattypography enthusiasts guard with fervor.
sentences.chinese: 但印刷體愛好者還是熱衷此道。

sentences.english: Dehn himself was a particularly enthusiastic advocate of group diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 戴恩本人就特別熱衷的羣圖解的倡導者。

sentences.english: Joe went enthusiastically to every lecture like a fresher.
sentences.chinese: 喬像一個大學新生一樣，熱衷於每一次講座。

sentences.english: At FutureProof we are passionate about designing sustainable buildings, landscapes and communities.
sentences.chinese: 我們熱衷於設計有承受力的建築物，園藝和社區。

sentences.english: I can’t understand why everyone is so crazy about big-name brands.
sentences.chinese: 我弄不懂大家爲什麼這樣熱衷於名牌商品。

sentences.english: I am a fan of both the focusing lever and the larger attachable hood.
sentences.chinese: 我熱衷於對焦杆和大的附加遮光罩。

sentences.english: Skinski was a warm member with the gab.
sentences.chinese: 斯根斯基是一個熱衷於神侃的人。

sentences.english: Hence, a growing number of individuals are showing incredible enthusiasm in financial comsumption and investment.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多的民衆開始熱衷金融消費與金融投資。

sentences.english: Sh: It seems that Australians aren't keen on education and job skills.
sentences.chinese: 好象澳大利亞人並不熱衷熱愛教育和職業培訓。

sentences.english: Manufacturers and service providers are increasingly interested in working with Energy Star.
sentences.chinese: 製造商和服務商越來越熱衷於與“能源之星”合作。

sentences.english: Fortune was keen to enumerate our progress.
sentences.chinese: 《財富雜誌》熱衷於枚舉我們的進步。

sentences.english: I'm interested in photo-taking and traveling. I like sports very much, especially tennis and basketball.
sentences.chinese: 我非常熱衷運動，特別是打網球跟籃球。

definition: to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
the masses/the great bulk of the population/popular (of music, science etc)
to focus/to concentrate/to give one's full attention
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
